protocol_name: Phenol/chloroform genomic DNA extraction-1.5 ml Eppendorf tube.
protocol_name_html: Phenol/chloroform genomic DNA extraction-1.5 ml Eppendorf tube.
before_start: You will need to make the 20 mL of Lysis Buffer prior to running this protocol.
warning: Do all Phenol and Chloroform procedures in a fume hood.
protocol_affiliation: King Lab, University of California Berkeley.
affiliation: Institute of Evolutionary Biology (CSIC-Universitat Pompeu Fabra)
manuscript_citation: Richter, Daniel J and Fozouni, Parinaz and Eisen, Michael and King, Nicole. Gene family innovation, conservation and loss on the animal stem lineage. 2018;7:e34226 https://doi.org/10.7554/eLife.34226

groups.group_name: Protist Research to Optimize Tools in Genetics (PROT-G)

ownership_history.affiliation: Institute of Evolutionary Biology (CSIC-Universitat Pompeu Fabra)

keywords: phenol, phenol chloroform, genomic DNA, DNA extraction, Eppendorf tube.

collections.protocol_name: Transcriptome sequencing of 19 diverse species of choanoflagellates
collections.protocol_name_html: Transcriptome sequencing of 19 diverse species of choanoflagellates

sub_authors.affiliation: King Lab, University of California Berkeley.

authors_list.name: Daniel Richter
authors_list.affiliation: King Lab, University of California Berkeley.

components.data: In a centrifuge, spin cells down in a 50 mL conical tube at maximum speed  for 20 minutes at 4º C.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: In a centrifuge, spin cells down in a 50 mL conical tube at maximum speed  for 20 minutes at 4º C.

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 1 of Phenol/chloroform genomic DNA extraction-1.5 ml Eppendorf tube.
source_data.protocol_name: Phenol/chloroform genomic DNA extraction-1.5 ml Eppendorf tube.

source_data.thread_text: Maximum speeds vary, adjust according to individual availability.
source_data.body: Maximum speeds vary, adjust according to individual availability.

components.data: Per cell pellet, add lysis buffer in multiples of 700 μL per pellet.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Per cell pellet, add lysis buffer in multiples of 700 μL per pellet.

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 2 of Phenol/chloroform genomic DNA extraction-1.5 ml Eppendorf tube.
source_data.protocol_name: Phenol/chloroform genomic DNA extraction-1.5 ml Eppendorf tube.
source_data.protocol_name_html: Phenol/chloroform genomic DNA extraction-1.5 ml Eppendorf tube.
source_data.annotation: For example, 1.4 mL, 2.1 mL, etc., depending on pellet volume.
source_data.thread_text: For example, 1.4 mL, 2.1 mL, etc., depending on pellet volume.
source_data.body: For example, 1.4 mL, 2.1 mL, etc., depending on pellet volume.

source_data.protocol_name: Lysis Buffer for Phenol/ chloroform genomic DNA extraction (makes 20 mL of buffer)
source_data.protocol_name_html: Lysis Buffer for Phenol/ chloroform genomic DNA extraction (makes 20 mL of buffer)
source_data.description: Yeilds 20 mL of Lysis buffer to be used in Phenol/ chloroform genomic DNA extrations.

versions.protocol_name_html: Lysis Buffer for Phenol/ chloroform genomic DNA extraction (makes 20 mL of buffer)

ownership_history.affiliation: Institute of Evolutionary Biology (CSIC-Universitat Pompeu Fabra)

collections.protocol_name: Transcriptome sequencing of 19 diverse species of choanoflagellates
collections.protocol_name_html: Transcriptome sequencing of 19 diverse species of choanoflagellates

authors_list.name: Daniel Richter
authors_list.affiliation: King Lab, University of California Berkeley.

components.data: 1 M Tris-Cl
components.name: Description

source_data.description: 1 M Tris-Cl

components.data: 0.5 M EDTA
components.name: Description

source_data.description: 0.5 M EDTA

components.data: SDS
components.name: Description

source_data.description: SDS

components.data: Pass sample through a 1 mL or a 5 mL syringe fitted with a 21 gauge needle, twenty times.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Pass sample through a 1 mL or a 5 mL syringe fitted with a 21 gauge needle, twenty times.

components.data: Spin cells down again for 20 minutes at maximum speed at 4º C, to pellet unlysed cellular material.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Spin cells down again for 20 minutes at maximum speed at 4º C, to pellet unlysed cellular material.

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 4 of Phenol/chloroform genomic DNA extraction-1.5 ml Eppendorf tube.
source_data.protocol_name: Phenol/chloroform genomic DNA extraction-1.5 ml Eppendorf tube.
source_data.protocol_name_html: Phenol/chloroform genomic DNA extraction-1.5 ml Eppendorf tube.
source_data.annotation: Maximum speeds vary, adjust according to individual availability.
source_data.thread_text: Maximum speeds vary, adjust according to individual availability.
source_data.body: Maximum speeds vary, adjust according to individual availability.

components.data: Split the supernatant from each conical tube into 700 μL aliquots and place into 1.5 mL Eppendorf tubes.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Split the supernatant from each conical tube into 700 μL aliquots and place into 1.5 mL Eppendorf tubes.

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 5 of Phenol/chloroform genomic DNA extraction-1.5 ml Eppendorf tube.
source_data.protocol_name: Phenol/chloroform genomic DNA extraction-1.5 ml Eppendorf tube.
source_data.protocol_name_html: Phenol/chloroform genomic DNA extraction-1.5 ml Eppendorf tube.
source_data.annotation: If desired, retain mostly bacterial unlysed pellets for later use.
source_data.thread_text: If desired, retain mostly bacterial unlysed pellets for later use.
source_data.body: If desired, retain mostly bacterial unlysed pellets for later use.
source_data.affiliation: Institute of Evolutionary Biology (CSIC-Universitat Pompeu Fabra)

components.data: Add 3.5 μL RNAse A per tube (4 mg/ml, final concentration 20 ng/μl).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 3.5 μL RNAse A per tube (4 mg/ml, final concentration 20 ng/μl).

components.data: Incubate for 5 minutes at room temperature on a nutator.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Incubate for 5 minutes at room temperature on a nutator.

components.data: Incubate at 50º C for 3 hours, swirling occasionally.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Incubate at 50º C for 3 hours, swirling occasionally.

components.data: Add 7 μL of Proteinase K (at 10 mg/mL, final concentration of 100 ng/μL).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 7 μL of Proteinase K (at 10 mg/mL, final concentration of 100 ng/μL).

components.data: Cool to room temperature.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Cool to room temperature.

components.data: Add 700 μL of phenol:chloroform:isoamyl alcohol at a pH of 8.0, per tube.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 700 μL of phenol:chloroform:isoamyl alcohol at a pH of 8.0, per tube.

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 11 of Phenol/chloroform genomic DNA extraction-1.5 ml Eppendorf tube.
source_data.protocol_name: Phenol/chloroform genomic DNA extraction-1.5 ml Eppendorf tube.
source_data.protocol_name_html: Phenol/chloroform genomic DNA extraction-1.5 ml Eppendorf tube.
source_data.annotation: All phenol:chloroform steps should be performed in the chemical hood.
source_data.thread_text: All phenol:chloroform steps should be performed in the chemical hood.
source_data.body: All phenol:chloroform steps should be performed in the chemical hood.

components.data: In hood, shake vigorously to mix.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: In hood, shake vigorously to mix.

components.data: In centrifuge, spin for 10 minutes at maximum speed, at room temperature.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: In centrifuge, spin for 10 minutes at maximum speed, at room temperature.

components.data: Transfer aqueous phase (upper) into a new tube.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Transfer aqueous phase (upper) into a new tube.

components.data: Repeat phenol:chloroform:isoamyl extraction (steps 11-14 above) until no protein remains at interphase.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Repeat phenol:chloroform:isoamyl extraction (steps 11-14 above) until no protein remains at interphase.

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 15 of Phenol/chloroform genomic DNA extraction-1.5 ml Eppendorf tube.
source_data.protocol_name: Phenol/chloroform genomic DNA extraction-1.5 ml Eppendorf tube.
source_data.protocol_name_html: Phenol/chloroform genomic DNA extraction-1.5 ml Eppendorf tube.

components.data: Add an equal volume of chloroform:isoamyl alcohol (no phenol), and shake vigorously to mix.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add an equal volume of chloroform:isoamyl alcohol (no phenol), and shake vigorously to mix.

components.data: Spin for 10 minutes at maximum speed, at room temperature.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Spin for 10 minutes at maximum speed, at room temperature.

components.data: Remove aqueous phase (upper), combining into a single tube with room for 3X the volume of sample.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Remove aqueous phase (upper), combining into a single tube with room for 3X the volume of sample.

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 18 of Phenol/chloroform genomic DNA extraction-1.5 ml Eppendorf tube.
source_data.protocol_name: Phenol/chloroform genomic DNA extraction-1.5 ml Eppendorf tube.
source_data.protocol_name_html: Phenol/chloroform genomic DNA extraction-1.5 ml Eppendorf tube.
source_data.annotation: Can use a 1.5 mL Eppendorf tube or a 15 mL conical.
source_data.thread_text: Can use a 1.5 mL Eppendorf tube or a 15 mL conical.
source_data.body: Can use a 1.5 mL Eppendorf tube or a 15 mL conical.

components.data: Add 1/20 of the volume of 10 M ammonium acetate, for a final concentration of 0.5 M.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 1/20 of the volume of 10 M ammonium acetate, for a final concentration of 0.5 M.

components.data: Add 1/3 μL of GlycoBlue per 100 μL of aqueous phase.(at 15 mg/mL, final concentration 50 ng/μL)
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 1/3 μL of GlycoBlue per 100 μL of aqueous phase.(at 15 mg/mL, final concentration 50 ng/μL)

components.data: Add 2x the volume of 100% EtOH.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 2x the volume of 100% EtOH.

components.data: Invert 5-10 times to precipitate DNA.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Invert 5-10 times to precipitate DNA.

components.data: Precipitate several hours, or overnight at -20º C.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Precipitate several hours, or overnight at -20º C.

components.data: Spin at maximum speed at room temperature for 20 minutes.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Spin at maximum speed at room temperature for 20 minutes.

components.data: Pour off supernatant.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Pour off supernatant.

components.data: Add 1 mL or 10 mL of 100% EtOH to wash pellet.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 1 mL or 10 mL of 100% EtOH to wash pellet.

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 26 of Phenol/chloroform genomic DNA extraction-1.5 ml Eppendorf tube.
source_data.protocol_name: Phenol/chloroform genomic DNA extraction-1.5 ml Eppendorf tube.
source_data.protocol_name_html: Phenol/chloroform genomic DNA extraction-1.5 ml Eppendorf tube.
source_data.annotation: Volume of EtOH to use depends on whether the pellet is in a 1.5 mL or 15 mL tube.
source_data.thread_text: Volume of EtOH to use depends on whether the pellet is in a 1.5 mL or 15 mL tube.
source_data.body: Volume of EtOH to use depends on whether the pellet is in a 1.5 mL or 15 mL tube.

components.data: Wash on nutator for 5 minutes at room temperature.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Wash on nutator for 5 minutes at room temperature.

components.data: Spin 5-20 mintues at maximum speed.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Spin 5-20 mintues at maximum speed.

components.data: Repeat 100% EtOH wash, for a total of 2-3 washes.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Repeat 100% EtOH wash, for a total of 2-3 washes.

components.data: Pour off supernatant.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Pour off supernatant.

components.data: Add 1 mL or 10 mL of 70% EtOH, depending on tube size, to wash pellet.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 1 mL or 10 mL of 70% EtOH, depending on tube size, to wash pellet.

components.data: Wash on nutator for 5 minutes at room temperature.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Wash on nutator for 5 minutes at room temperature.

components.data: Spin 5-20 minutes at maximum speed.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Spin 5-20 minutes at maximum speed.

components.data: Remove supernatant, dry pellet for 5-10 minutes, do not over dry.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Remove supernatant, dry pellet for 5-10 minutes, do not over dry.

components.data: Re-suspend overnight in a small volume (~50-500 μL) of DNAse-free water.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Re-suspend overnight in a small volume (~50-500 μL) of DNAse-free water.

components.data: Pour off supernatant.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Pour off supernatant.

components.data: Repeat 70% EtOH wash for a total of 2-3 washes.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Repeat 70% EtOH wash for a total of 2-3 washes.

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 35 of Phenol/chloroform genomic DNA extraction-1.5 ml Eppendorf tube.
source_data.protocol_name: Phenol/chloroform genomic DNA extraction-1.5 ml Eppendorf tube.
source_data.protocol_name_html: Phenol/chloroform genomic DNA extraction-1.5 ml Eppendorf tube.
source_data.annotation: Volume of EtOH to use depends on whether the pellet is in a 1.5 mL or 15 mL tube.
source_data.thread_text: Volume of EtOH to use depends on whether the pellet is in a 1.5 mL or 15 mL tube.
source_data.body: Volume of EtOH to use depends on whether the pellet is in a 1.5 mL or 15 mL tube.
